data.name: FIGHTING GIRL SAKURA-R - HCG PACK
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is essential data needed for the game.

Distributed in DLC due to overcapacity.

This DLC contains HCG animation data for 10 monsters.


Be sure to install the DLC and play the main game.


thank you.

data.short_description: - Contains unwanted sexual acts and nudity. - All characters in this game are over 18 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7
  • Processor: INTEL I3 2XXX
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VGA 2G
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7
  • Processor: INTEL I5 2XXX
  • Graphics: VGA 3G
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
The developers describe the content like this:
warning!!
This is adult-only content that contains sexual content.
Sexual content in this game includes sexual assault/sex without consent, sex with zombies, etc.
If you are looking for an ordinary game, this is not the game for you.
All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
